verbs.description: The US military [V: will] stop " war games " on the Korean Peninsula , US President Donald Trump said Tuesday , as he announced details of his discussions with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .

[ARG0: The US military] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: stop] [ARG1: " war games "] [ARGM-LOC: on the Korean Peninsula] , US President Donald Trump said Tuesday , as he announced details of his discussions with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .

The US military will stop " war games " on the Korean Peninsula , [ARG0: US President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] , [ARGM-TMP: as he announced details of his discussions with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
